data.text2:
Before you can complete your assessment of the tent city area you need more information regarding what units will beddown on this installation.

Review the ESP and TPFDD to learn more.
data.text5:
Before Major Marks can complete his assessment of the tent city area he needs more information regarding what units will beddown on this installation.

He has assigned you to review the ESP and the TPFDD to learn more.
